Flow.description: Allows teams to create a new related Case for another team from an existing Case <Credit & Collections removed until this team starts using Cases in SFDC>

formulas.description: Calculates the org hyperlink to be used as a clickable link
formulas.name: fx_Hyperlink

formulas.description: Stores text to be used in the Custom Description field on the new related Case
formulas.name: var_CaseDescription
formulas.expression: "This Case was created by another team and assigned to your Queue. See Case Comments and the related Parent Case for additional details."
